description:
Stay cool long after you drop in. The comfortable Syncro 20 Hydration Pack has a suspended mesh trampoline back panel to boost air flow as you ride. The bike-specific internal organization helps prevent clutter of tools and gear, and an integrated rain cover keeps you dry during unexpected showers. Bonus: the LidLock system holds your helmet when you’re walking or hosing down your bike post-ride.

  • LightWire frame creates a platform for a contoured tensioned mesh backpanel
  • AirSpeed™ AntiGravity breathable mesh suspension allows air to flow freely between the pack and your back
  • Ventilated foam shoulder straps and hip wings provide stable and breathable carrying
  • Padded waistbelt with zippered pockets for gels or other quick-access items
  • Deep zippered opening gives you easy access without needing to dig through everything
  • Zippered top-pocket has a scratch-free lining to protect sunnies or electronics
  • Front stretch mesh pocket holds an extra layer
  • Front organizer pocket opens wide so you can grab tools, tubes and pumps from their dedicated sleeves
  • Dedicated hydration compartment holds the included Hydraulics™ LT 2.5L reservoir with quick-connect attachment for easy filling
  • Magnetic clip keeps the bite valve tethered
  • Low-profile helmet carry attachment slips through your helmet's vents to hold it securely in place
  • Reflective details and a loop for a blinky light
  • Includes a custom-fit rain cover that stows away in a dedicated pocket at the bottom of the pack
name: Osprey Syncro 20 Hydration Pack - Men's
